content.prompt: The two passages best represent which of the following justifications for European imperialism?

choices.label: The idea that the colonies would provide opportunities for the settlement of European farmers
The nationalist competition among European states over colonial territory
The concept of the European mission to civilize colonized peoples
The acquisition of new markets and territories

skill.text: Skill 2.C: Explain the significance of a source's point of view, purpose, historical situation, and/or audience, including how these might limit the use(s) of a source.
